articles.description: ALBUQUERQUE, N.M. (KRQE) – Two major Albuquerque churches held services celebrating the holiday with few face masks and little, to no, social distancing. The videos of these services are circulating online and now New Mexicans are outraged. State officials ha…

articles.author: Brian Freeman
articles.title: Companies Developing Apps to Upload Vaccine Passports - Newsmax
articles.description: Experts are speculating that an eventual return to the normal pre-coronavirus world of packed concerts, sporting events, movies and flying abroad might require an individual to have a vaccine passport, CNN reported on Sunday.

articles.title: Chattanooga delivery drivers unable to work as AT&T outage continues - WTVC
